name: Gift Voucher - £100
description:
We have gift vouchers available redeemable against tattoos in Blue Lotus with artists Loz Phillips or Christian Banks.
Check out the shop at www.facebook.co.uk/bluelotustattoostudio

The vouchers are white card with a black design and measure 10.5cm x 14.5cm.

There is no time constraint in which to use the vouchers, they're valid until you use them.

They are available in £10, £20, £50 or £100. *THIS IS FOR A £100 GIFT VOUCHER*

If, for example, you're after £150 in vouchers, please order 1 x £100 and 1 x £50 and you will be sent out one voucher reading £150.

If you're buying multiple gift cards for separate people please state this in the message box at checkout or email orctattoo@googlemail.com this is just so the amounts aren't added together as above.

Please Note: Due to the nature of the item, these will only be sent First Class Recorded. As with all our items, you're welcome to come and purchase them in the shop to avoid postage costs.

name: Bascinet Lady
description: ON SALE! Usual price - £20 Now - £15 Fantastic quality, heavy ringspun, 100% cotton t-shirts of a lady wearing a Bascinet. This hand drawn design includes bits of everything I like to draw! (Limited run of 25) Sorry, we're all out of XL :( This t-shirt was voted 'T-shirt of the week' by Fire Label Merchandising, the company who printed it for me, which I'm really chuffed about. See the post about it here!

name: Native American Lady
description:
ON SALE! Usual price - £10 Now - £8

A4 sized print of a Native American Lady on textured card. 

(Limited run of 6)

Signed by Loz.

All A4 prints are sent in a Hard Board envelope to protect it against the heavy hands of the postman.

name: Omniscience Owl
description:
A beautiful 22" X 12" sized print of Omniscience Owl on textured card, signed by Loz. 

(Limited run of 10)

This print is sent in a postal tube to protect it against the heavy hands of the postman.

ONLY ONE LEFT!

name: Yellow Rose (Original)
description:
An original framed painting of a yellow rose. The rose itself measures roughly 4 x 4" and the frame measures 12 x 10". Only one available.

Signed by Loz.

name: Pig in a hat
description: *SOLD OUT* A4 print of a pig in a hat. The bottom isn't chopped off in real life, It just wouldn't scan properly. (Only 1 available)

name: The Duke Of Wellington
description:
ON SALE! Usual price - £10 Now - £8

A4 print of The Duke Of Wellington on textured card.

(Limited run of 6)

A traditional styled portrait of the Duke of Wellington Sir Arthur Wellesley. I also want to tattoo this so message me if you would like it!

Signed by Loz.

All A4 prints are sent in a Hard Board envelope to protect it against the heavy hands of the postman.

name: Dagger
description: *SOLD OUT* 7 x 8"(ish) print of a dagger. (Only 1 available)

name: Devil Woman
description:
ON SALE! Usual price - £10 Now - £8

A4 print of a Devil Woman on textured card.
